title: Johnson Says U.K. Restrictions Will Probably Get Tougher
content:
1. Johnson Says U.K. Restrictions Will Probably Get Tougher  Bloomberg
  2. UK Prime Minister 'reconciled' to tougher Covid-19 restrictions as cases soar  CNN
  3. Covid live news: Johnson says he is 'reconciled' to prospect of tighter restrictions soon; South Korea says it is containing third wave  The Guardian
  4. Boris Johnson says COVID-19 lockdowns 'probably going to get tougher'  New York Post
  5. Boris Johnson 'reconciled' to prospect of UK coronavirus restrictions tightening  Guardian News
